section.name: Modello JDOM Plugin
section.p: Modello JDOM Plugin generates XML writers based on JDOM 1 API. It attempts to preserve formatting of not changed elements and even with the changed ones it does some tricks to keep the formatting in line with the rest.
Notice: DOM content type is represented as plexus-utils' Xpp3Dom objects
